name: CreateTrelloChecklist
description:
Create a new checklist in Trello.

This tool creates a checklist in Trello. It should be called when a user wants to add a checklist to a Trello board.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Trello card where the checklist will be added.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Card that the checklist should be added to.

parameters.name: checklist_name
parameters.description: The name of the checklist to be created. It should be a string with 1 to 16384 characters.

value_schema.description: The name of the checklist. Should be a string of length 1 to 16384.

parameters.name: checklist_position
parameters.description: The position of the checklist on the card. Accepts 'top', 'bottom', or a positive number indicating specific placement.

value_schema.description: The position of the checklist on the card. One of: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number.

parameters.name: source_checklist_id
parameters.description: The ID of the checklist to be copied into the new checklist.

value_schema.description: The ID of a checklist to copy into the new checklist.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: idCard
parameters.description: The ID of the Card that the checklist should be added to.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Card that the checklist should be added to.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the checklist. Should be a string of length 1 to 16384.

value_schema.description: The name of the checklist. Should be a string of length 1 to 16384.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: The position of the checklist on the card. One of: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number.

value_schema.description: The position of the checklist on the card. One of: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number.

parameters.name: idChecklistSource
parameters.description: The ID of a checklist to copy into the new checklist.

value_schema.description: The ID of a checklist to copy into the new checklist.
